objective: how to track prompts, results and costs in openai agents sdk

sub_tasks.task: Review OpenAI Agents SDK official documentation for built-in tracking and logging features.
Identify methods to log prompts and responses within the SDK’s workflow (e.g., hooks, callbacks, middleware).
Investigate programmatic access to usage and cost data via OpenAI API (e.g., tokens used, billing endpoints).
Explore third-party tools and libraries for tracking and visualizing prompt/result/cost data with OpenAI agents.
Examine examples from OpenAI and the developer community showcasing tracking implementations.
Assess best practices for storing and querying prompt/result/cost logs (e.g., local files, databases, cloud logging).
Identify any SDK limitations or knowledge gaps related to tracking (such as real-time cost estimation or prompt/result linkage).
Compare tracking capabilities between different OpenAI SDK versions or similar frameworks (e.g., LangChain, LlamaIndex).
Suggest actionable steps for integrating custom tracking (e.g., event emitters or decorators) if built-in options are insufficient.
